parameters: \pf[1]\n<\P[1]>I bet that switch over there will lower the spikes, though...

\pf[1]\n<\P[1]>I bet I could sneak right by it
if I go by while it's not looking.
\pf[1]\n<\P[1]>A monster! Time to show this curse what I'm made of!

Press \I[12] at the right time when defending to reduce damage.
